text: "Hip Hop Police" is a 2007 song by American rapper Chamillionaire and British- American rapper Slick Rick. It was the first single of Chamillionaire's second album, Ultimate Victory. ==Charts== Chart (2007) Peak Position Germany (Official German Charts) 46 New Zealand (Recorded Music NZ) 34 UK Singles (Official Charts Company) 50 US Billboard Bubbling Under Hot 100 Singles 1 US Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs 76 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2007 songs Category:Chamillionaire songs Category:Songs written by Chamillionaire
title: Hip Hop Police
